string.text: Ship name must be between 1 and 30 characters
Make settlements unable to be clicked on
Sell my ships to who? The fleet is not at port.
Fleet must be in a settlement to be transported
Your fleet will arrive at {DESTINATION} in {DAYS_STRING}
Must own this fleet set its flagship
Set this ship as the flagship for the current fleet
Must own this ship in order to transfer it to antother fleet
Transfer this ship to another fleet in this port
Must be in the same location as this ship to repair it
Have this ship repaired by the shipwrights at the port
Have this ship repaired by your party's engineer
Must own this ship in order to sell it
Must be in the same Port Town as this ship in order to sell it
Must own this ship in order to upgrade it
Must be in the same location as this ship in order to upgrade it
Must own this ship in order to scrap it
Must be in the same location as this ship in order to scrap it
Must own this fleet in order to merge it
Must be in a settlement to merge fleets
Must be in same settlement as this fleet to merge with another
There must be another fleet in this settlement to merge with this fleet
Repair all ships in this fleet
Must own this fleet in order to sell it
Must be in the same Port Town as the fleet in order to sell it
Sell every ship in this fleet
Must own this fleet in order to transport it
Transport this fleet to another nearby port
The enemy surely won't allow me to land here peacfully. I should look for a suitable landing area.
I doubt the besiegers will allow me to cross their lines. Let us turn back.
One of your men reminds you that you are a wanted criminal here. Bet to turn back for now.
The port is bustling with sailors and ships.
Ask about paying for passage to another port.
Manage your fleet at this port
Manage your {NUM_FLEETS} fleets at this port
You have no fleets at this port
You have no fleets at this port to set sail with.
Your fleet does not have enough room for {SHIP_COUNT} of your men
You meet with the harbormaster who presents you with the following options for travelling between ports.
Hire ships for a one-way passage.
Select your destination. Prices are based on party size, amount of cargo, relation with the town, and, of course, distance to the destination.
No one here is willing to sail to a hostile port
No one here is willing to sail to a town that is under siege
You are prohibited entry to this destination
You are surrounded by the sights and sounds of the ship-making process.
See the ships that are available for purchase.
Here are the ships for sale in the harbor today.
Yes. Another fine addition to the fleet.
Looks like I don't have enough gold
Which fleet shall we send her to?
Select the receiving fleet or create a new one
You come upon a suitable landing area for landing your fleet
You arrive at an occupied landing area
You arrive at a vacant landing area
The ferryman will take you across for {TRAVEL_COST}{GOLD_ICON}
Your current fleet has been stored at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}
Your current fleet has been stored at a Ferry Point near {SETTLEMENT_NAME}

You have borrowed a fleet of ships in order to complete your quest for {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. Once that quest is completed, you must return to land in order for the ships to make their way back to their owner.

You have borrowed a fleet of ships in order to follow the army of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. Once you have left the army, you must return to land in order for the ships to make their way back to their owner.
You have completed your quest for {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. Now the owner wants his boats back. Simply return to land within {DAYS_COUNT}.
You have left the army of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} with the ships he lent you. Either return to land or rejoin the army within {DAYS_COUNT} days.
You have rejoined the army of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} with the ships he lent you.
You have successfully returned the ships you borrowed from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You have stolen the boats you borrowed from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. This has degraded his trust in you.
You have lost the ships you borrowed from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. This has degraded his trust in you.
